TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PowerModes extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines identifiers for power mode events reported by the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumeration defines identifiers that represent types of power mode changes or events. The values of this enumeration are used by a <xref:Microsoft.Win32.PowerModeChangedEventArgs> to indicate the type of a <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.PowerModeChanged> event.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Win32.PowerModes Resume = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The operating system is about to resume from a suspended state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Win32.PowerModes StatusChange = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A power mode status notification event has been raised by the operating system. This might indicate a weak or charging battery, a transition between AC power and battery, or another change in the status of the system power supply.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Win32.PowerModes Suspend = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The operating system is about to be suspended.
